level.text: The Commission shall not file in the District of Columbia Court of Appeals an order of removal certifying the entry of a judgment of a criminal conviction, as provided in ยง432(a)(1) of the Self-Government Act, without giving to the judge concerned at least ten (10) days notice of its intention to do so.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 24 DCR 9391, 9410 (May 5, 1978); Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 6032, 6042 (September 14, 1990); and Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9333, 9343 (December 11, 1992); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 108 (January 6, 2006); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 12322 (December 21, 2007).
